item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. IMG_0001 (387 points | 57 comments)
2. OpenTTD is an open source simulation game based upon Transport Tycoon Deluxe (87 points | 19 comments)
3. A particle physics course for high-school students (86 points | 2 comments)
4. Egoless Engineering (476 points | 177 comments)
5. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (509 points | 253 comments)
6. Show HN: Open-Source Colab Notebooks to Implement Advanced RAG Techniques (41 points | 5 comments)
7. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (398 points | 576 comments)
8. No Nat November: My Month Without IPv4 (82 points | 35 comments)
9. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (136 points | 22 comments)
10. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (151 points | 125 comments)
11. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (228 points | 69 comments)
12. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (89 points | 21 comments)
13. The Tube Computer (168 points | 51 comments)
14. Show HN: My C compiler compiled itself (137 points | 42 comments)
15. A new home for Python-build-standalone (72 points | 14 comments)
16. Gratitude despite the odds (33 points | 2 comments)
17. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (58 points | 16 comments)
18. Phoenix LiveView 1.0.0 is here (433 points | 76 comments)
19. EmacsConf 2024 (85 points | 1 comment)
20. The Porsche Macan EV is being recalled because its headlights are too bright (49 points | 88 comments)
21. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir with Membran (24 points | 1 comment)
22. Dependency management fatigue, or why I ditched React for Go+HTMX+Templ (214 points | 201 comments)
23. Formaldehyde Causes More Cancer Than Any Other Toxic Air Pollutant (94 points | 37 comments)
24. Making AWS News stupid fast with smart caching (15 points | 1 comment)
25. Rust library for building no-boilerplate CLI apps (40 points | 6 comments)
26. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (132 points | 157 comments)
27. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
28. Stephen King to shut down his 3 radio stations in Maine (85 points | 119 comments)
29. Show HN: Book and change flights with one email (74 points | 38 comments)
30. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (47 points | 10 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
